mapper.select: SELECT A.DSU_NO, DSU_NO, A.DSU_SUBJECT DSU_SUBJECT, A.DSU_AREA DSU_AREA, A.DSU_INTRODUCE DSU_INTRODUCE, A.DSU_APPLYYN DSU_APPLYYN , A.DSU_DELETEYN DSU_DELETEYN, TO_CHAR(A.DSU_INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DSU_INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.DSU_UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DSU_UPDATEDATE FROM DSU_SIGNUP A
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DMYMATCH_SIGNUP( DSU_NO, DSU_SUBJECT , DSU_INTRODUCE , DSU_APPLYYN , DSU_DELETEYN , DSU_INSERTDATE , DSU_UPDATEDATE ) VALUES( #{dsu_no}, #{dsu_subject}, #{dsu_area}, #{dsu_introduce}, 'W', 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
